Text:
Yes I did buy all this equipment to be able to give back to the P2P community just way better quality.
I only have about 700Gb drive-space left on the 3Tb I have installed but the PC can handle 2 more SATA drives/16-USB ports v1.1, 2 & 3 (almost lost 500Gb of documentaries on an external WD-HDD - Internalized/fixed and exchanged w/ 640Gb SATA - In the end I lost 1 torrent file, no media loss at all)

You're welcome!
Just help me seed!!!
Watch this and Animal autopsy of a giraffe (also NGC) & put creationism/'intelligent'-design to bed. Nothing intelligent in the design of the giraffe.
